ai-kv4.1:1.3_0: there is from a perfected one.
ai-kv4.1:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.1:1.5_0: he does not have a fellow cloth.
ai-kv4.1:1.7_0: If he can’t be despised by a layperson, he should surely be said:
ai-kv4.1:1.8_0: “Have you must become a perfected one?”
ai-kv4.1:2.3_0: Don’t a layperson or a renunciate has given up the fetters of attraction, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance?
ai-kv4.1:2.5_0: A perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha has given up the fetters, cut them off at the root, made them like a palm stump, obliterated them, and unable to arise in the future.
ai-kv4.1:2.6_0: “Have you must become a perfected one?”
ai-kv4.1:3.3_0: There are laypeople who, without giving up the fetter of suffering in the present life.
ai-kv4.1:3.4_0: there’s no-one else who does not exist in nothing.
ai-kv4.1:3.5_0: If anyone who is fettered in the present life, there’s no-one who does not misfortune in the present life.
ai-kv4.1:3.6_0: “Have you must become a perfected one?”
ai-kv4.1:4.3_0: the wanderer Vacchagotta said to the Buddha,
ai-kv4.1:4.4_0: “Master Gotama, are there any laypeople who, without giving up the fetter of suffering when the body breaks up?”
ai-kv4.1:4.5_0: “No, Vaccha, there is no need for laypeople and renunciates, whose body breaks up.”
ai-kv4.1:4.9_0: “Have you must become a perfected one?”
ai-kv4.1:5.3_0: It would be more fruitful to feeding on having sexual intercourse with her children. She accepts shaves like a robber or air sheet, dresses in ocher robes, and went to wandering in ocher robes, wearing garlands, perfumes, and makeup, and accepted gold and money. From then on the size of jungles, garlands, perfumes, and cosmetics.
ai-kv4.1:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.1:6.2_0: “Have you must become a perfected one?”
ai-kv4.1:6.4_0: Yasa, doesn’t son of a layman, regardless of whether he has reached the goal of Arahantship,
ai-kv4.1:6.6_0: But Yasa’s student servants, who were brahmin students, should say:
ai-kv4.1:6.7_0: “Have you must become a perfected one?”
ai-kv4.1:6.8_0: The account of the householder Arahants is finished.
